message: Let's start fair! 50/50 split seems like a good way to begin.
I appreciate the offer Alice, but I think I deserve a bit more for going first. How about a 60/40 split?
I understand you want a larger share, Bob. Let's compromise. I'm willing to go up to 52.5% for you to get 47.5%.
It seems we both want a larger share of the pie Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our offers - 55/45.
